H0.text: The splanchnocranium refers to the bones of which defining part of the human body. Skull

H1.text: The splanchnocranium refers to the bones of which defining part of the human body. Thorax

H2.text: The splanchnocranium refers to the bones of which defining part of the human body. Abdomen

H3.text: The splanchnocranium refers to the bones of which defining part of the human body. Face

A4.text: In mammals, the splanchnocranium comprises the three ear ossicles (incus, malleus, and stapes), as well as the alisphenoid, the styloid process, the hyoid apparatus, and the thyroid cartilage.
